I had high hope for this set, and all I can say is WOW!!! The material feels very soft and buttery, has a very high quality weight to it. It is the perfect thickness and looks timeless and expensive. The slightly oversized buttons along the forearm add a sweet touch. I will probably wear the set more as separate pieces than together, but that's more of a personal preference thing... I bought the medium (I wear both small and medium depending) and it is a perfect fit (I am 5'3" 130lbs). If you're on the fence about this, trust me, you're going to LOVE it!!!

This is my first clothing purchase and it is a hit!  The knit is of high quality and thus far holds its shape in the knees and butt. The cream color with the Carmel colored stripes matched my boots. I am also pleased that the stripes matched up on the seam lines, that’s a sign of good craftsmanship. I am 5’4”, 150 lbs, and the medium size fit well. Quality of buttons on sleeves is top notch too. Only complaint is the back split needs reinforcing, but I am doing that myself, otherwise, five stars.
